Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Contradistinction \Con`tra*dis*tinc"tion\, n. Distinction by contrast. [1913 Webster]
That there are such things as sins of infirmity in contradistinction to those of presumption is not to be questioned. --South. [1913 Webster]
contradistinction n : a distinction drawn on the basis of contrast; "sculpture in contradistinction to painting"
